snippet.title: Wanderlost - Exclusive Gameplay Trailer | Summer of Gaming 2022
snippet.description:
This new exclusive Wanderlost gameplay trailer shows all of the different activities you can do in this upcoming indie: Build, hunt, gather, fight, shoot, craft, and more. In this cheerful survival RPG, you'll have to fight off zombies. Previously on Kickstarter, Wanderlost is coming to regular pre-alpha soon.

#IGN #IGNSummerofGaming
